author: Stereogum
title: Jonny Greenwood Soundtracking Another Paul Thomas Anderson Movie Starring Daniel Day-Lewis
text: Radiohead's Jonny Greenwood has had a nice, solid partnership with director Paul Thomas Anderson for a few years now. They first worked together on 2007's Daniel Day-Lewis-starring There Will Be Blood, and Greenwood went on to score Anderson's 2012 film The Master and 2014's Inherent Vice. Anderson also made a documentary about Greenwood's Junun … More »
